snippet: One crew member was missing after a United States military helicopter crashed during a training exercise on Japan’s southern island of Okinawa on Monday, the Air Force said.
abstract: One crew member is missing after United States military helicopter crashes during training exercise on Japan’s southern island of Okinawa.
lead_paragraph: One crew member was missing after a United States military helicopter crashed during a training exercise on Japan’s southern island of Okinawa on Monday, the Air Force said.

headline.main: Japan: U.S. Military Helicopter Crashes on Okinawa
